
     This is yabasic.

 Yabasic is subject to the Artistic License or
 the Gnu General Public License at your choice.
 See www.yabasic.de for details

 To INSTALL yabasic: click on setup.exe
 To REMOVE yabasic: click on the software icon of the control panel
 To CUSTOMIZE: Edit the registry-keys in 
       HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE/SOFTWARE/yabasic

 A full description of the syntax of yabasic can be found 
 in the file:
                 yabasic.htm

 Please send any comments and bug reports to
     
                 mail@yabasic.de

    Thanx !
